thought: To craft the orange_stained_glass_pane, I need to craft glass_pane first. Glass_pane requires 9 glass blocks in a square pattern in the crafting table. Therefore I will move a glass block from slot 17 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1
